items.name: This Site!
items.description: A responsive portfolio website showcasing skills, projects, and experiences.
items.longDescription: This project was created to display my portfolio in an engaging and modern way. It features a responsive design, interactive elements, and showcases my skills and experiences in software development.

items.name: BuffBuddy
items.description: A CLI application to help users track their fitness journeys.
items.longDescription: BuffBuddy is a Command Line Interface (CLI) application designed to track workouts, meals, and water intake. It's simple yet effective for anyone starting their fitness journey.

items.name: Vertical Immersion Cooling
items.description: Served as the lead engineer in a startathon, designed a modular immersion cooling system for better accessibility.
items.longDescription: This project aims to revolutionize server cooling by using vertical immersion systems. The modular design improves accessibility and scalability for data centers.

items.name: E-Mini Mart
items.description: Developed a digital e-commerce solution during a hackathon.
items.longDescription: E-Mini Mart is an e-commerce platform built for a hackathon. It integrates inventory management, payment systems, and a user-friendly interface.

items.name: Alex the Rescue Bot
items.description: A robot designed for search and rescue operations.
items.longDescription: Alex the Rescue Bot leverages SLAM for navigation and Arduino/Raspberry Pi 4 for processing. It's designed to aid in disaster response scenarios.

items.name: Ryan the Maze Runner
items.description: A robot designed to navigate mazes autonomously.
items.longDescription: Ryan is a maze-solving robot powered by Arduino and mBot sensors. It uses algorithms to calculate the optimal path through a maze.

items.name: Pet Comms
items.description: A pet communication system for my pet to call me whenever.
items.longDescription: Pet Comms is a system that allows pets to communicate with their owners through a simple interface. It uses Raspberry Pi and a custom app for interaction.
